oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ökologischer Landbau in der Ukraine: Status-quo und Entwicklungspotenziale
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Danyljuk, Marta
Häring, Dr. Anna Maria
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ukraine
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this paper is to analyse the current state of the organic farming sector in Ukraine and it’s future development potentials. Emphasis will be placed on the history of Organic Farming in Ukraine, the most common reasons for conversion to Organic Farming as well as the current situation of production, legislation and marketing.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Danyljuk, Marta and Häring, Dr. Anna Maria (2005) Ökologischer Landbau in der Ukraine: Status-quo und Entwicklungspotenziale. [Organic Farming in the Ukraine: Status-quo and development potentials.] In: Heß, J and Rahmann, G (Eds.) Ende der Nische, Beiträge zur 8. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, kassel university press GmbH, Kassel.
